Frequently Asked Questions

Why WordPress?

WordPress powers over 40% of websites worldwide. It's secure, flexible, and built for SEO. Naveeg makes it accessible without technical hassle.

Do I need technical skills?

No. If you can send an email, you can edit your website. Everything is drag-and-drop.

How is Naveeg different from other builders?

Other tools limit you to templates. Naveeg gives you a real WordPress site with SEO, analytics, and marketing tools included.

What happens after the free trial?

Choose a plan to keep your site live. If you cancel, the site goes offline. No contracts, cancel anytime.

Do I need a credit card to start?

No. The 7-day trial requires no payment info.

Can I use my own domain?

Yes. Connect your custom domain in one click.

Will my site rank on Google?

Yes. Naveeg creates SEO-friendly pages by default and helps you improve them with suggestions.

What about support?

Email and chat support are included. Pro plans get priority support with extended hours.

Get your website live today

Start free, no credit card required. Cancel anytime.
